text:
Aaptiv | New York City, NY | ONSITE | Full-time

At Aaptiv, we want to improve the lives of millions through fitness. We are the top audio-based fitness app on the Apple App Store and we're looking for some great engineers to join our engineering team of 25 people.

Some of our current openings are for: - Engineering Team Lead - Web Growth: https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/aaptivcom/view/P_AAA... - Senior Software Engineer - Search: https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/aaptivcom/view/P_AAA... - Full Stack Engineer - Web Growth: https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/aaptivcom/view/P_AAA...

All positions are full time at our new office in 1 WTC. To see more openings or to learn more about Aaptiv, check out https://aaptiv.com/jobs
